content:
Strassburger family

1 Lebel STRASSBURGER                 1767 (Abraham) {census family 102}
 + Chaia Sara                        1775 - 1835 #223 (Saul)
  2o Feigel STRASSBURGER             1792
    * Abram BUCHBERG                 1791 - 1838 #182
          married Feb 10, 1811 #2
        FAMILY LISTING
  2o Gnendel STRASSBURGER            Oct 11, 1798 Krakow
  2x Samuel Nechemias STRASSBURGER   Jan 4, 1802 Krakow - 1854 #153
    + Rachel RAUCHER                 1801-02 - 1853 #271 (Moses+Taubel Berl)
          married Jan 6, 1820 #3
     3o Taubela STRASSBURGER         1821 #201
       * Marek BADER                 1822 #405
             married Aug 3, 1844 #48
           FAMILY LISTING
     3x Saul STRASSBURGER            1823 #397 - 1824 #236
     3x Abraam Hirsz STRASSBURGER    1826 #196
     3x Izaak Baruch STRASSBURGER    1829 #9 - 1832 #203
     3x Mozes Leib STRASSBURGER      1831 #221
    + Feigel Mindel BRAUNSTEIN       ?1814 #112 - after 1880
     3o Marya Leja STRASSBURGER      Sep 8, 1854 #390
       * Jozef Bernard ZAUDERER      Jun 1850 Nowy Sacz
             married May 1, 1877 #20
  2o Debora STRASSBURGER             Jan 3, 1804 Krakow
  2o Rachel STRASSBURGER             1806 - ?Aug 30, 1887 #347
    * Chaim EISENBACH                1805
          married Feb 10, 1824 #7
        FAMILY LISTING
  2o Anna Ella STRASSBURGER          1810
    * Fischel KORAL                  Dec 13, 1808 Krakow
        FAMILY LISTING
  2o Kayle Hendel STRASSBURGER       1815 #30
    * Israel Zelig ARBER             1812 - Nov 2, 1886 #401
          married Nov 5, 1833 #101
        FAMILY LISTING




     Juda STRASSBERG                 1780-88
    + Perla ZENZAR /CINDZER          1783-85 - May 25, 1811 #38b
     3x Zeleg STRASSBERG             Dec 17, 1810 #80
    + Scheindel                      1789 (Abram/Szaja)
     3x Szaja STRASSBERG             1812 #198 - 1814 #54
     3o Kayle Rachel STRASSBERG      1818 #294
